name: Color Runner (Jubileus Deus)
description:
Color Runner is a casual mobile game prototype made during the FEJA 5 : a major esport tournament held in Cote d'Ivoire (West Africa). A game jam was organised with the theme : Reinvent the classics. 

This is our submission. We decided to create a infinite runner and adding a kinda new gameplay to it.

The goal of the game is to go through doors of the same color of the cube. Each time the cube pass successfully a door, it changes his color randomly. Items do not work for now but will be added later.

NB : The game is in french language but it should be easy to start the game and play it. A translation will be added later.
